properties.name: 1025 S Waterford Drive
properties.address_full: 1025 South Waterford Drive, Florissant, MO, USA
properties.marketing_message:
Welcome home to 1025 South Waterford Drive in desirable Florissant! This updated 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home offers comfortable living in a fantastic location within the Ferguson-Florissant School District. Boasting 984 square feet of space, this home features a full, partially finished basement, perfect for extra living or storage. You'll love the convenience of an attached garage and off-street parking.

Inside, enjoy modern amenities like central AC, a dishwasher, and a fully equipped kitchen with a refrigerator and stove/oven. Tile floors add a touch of elegance. Laundry hookups are available. Relax and entertain in the spacious backyard.

This home is close to everything you need, including shopping and major highways, making your commute and errands a breeze. Pets are welcome with a pet fee and additional pet rent. Donâ€™t miss out on this great opportunity to live in a wonderful community! Schedule your showing today!

properties.marketing_pets_policy: Pets allowed with pet fee and additional pet rent.
